title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Framework Design Project for Employee Competency and Maturity Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design a competency evaluation framework by selecting five core competency items (e.g., communication, problem-solving, emotional regulation) to assess employees in service/customer interaction fields, including a three-tier evaluation scale (high/medium/low) for each item.
Apply the Capability Maturity Model (CMM) to propose personalized learning pathways.

Learners can interview three or more experts in service/customer interaction fields using knowledge engineering techniques (e.g., interviews, card sorting), develop five or more evaluation criteria based on the findings, and produce an evaluation criteria document achieving over 80% suitability in peer review and expert validation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
